n = 3: 1 3 2 
n = 4: 1 4 2 3 
n = 5: 1 4 5 3 2 
n = 6: 1 4 6 3 2 5 
n = 7: 1 4 6 7 2 5 3 
n = 8: 1 4 6 8 2 5 3 7 
n = 9: 1 4 6 8 9 5 3 7 2 
n = 10: 1 4 6 8 10 5 3 7 2 9 
n = 11: 1 4 6 8 10 11 3 7 2 9 5 
n = 12: 1 4 6 8 10 12 3 7 2 9 5 11 
n = 13: 1 4 6 8 10 12 13 7 2 9 5 11 3 
n = 14: 1 4 6 8 10 12 14 7 2 9 5 11 3 13 
n = 15: 1 4 6 8 10 12 14 15 2 9 5 11 3 13 7 
n = 16: 1 4 6 8 10 12 14 16 2 9 5 11 3 13 7 15 
n = 17: 1 4 6 8 10 12 14 16 17 9 5 11 3 13 7 15 2 
n = 18: 1 4 6 8 10 12 14 16 18 9 5 11 3 13 7 15 2 17 
n = 19: 1 4 6 8 10 12 14 16 18 19 5 11 3 13 7 15 2 17 9 
n = 20: 1 4 6 8 10 12 14 16 18 20 5 11 3 13 7 15 2 17 9 19
